text: Ronald "Ron" Jeffery Brace III (December 18, 1986 â€“ April 23, 2016) was an American football nose tackle. He was drafted by the New England Patriots in the second round of the 2009 NFL Draft as a defensive end. He played college football at Boston College. He played for the Patriots from 2009 through 2012. Brace died suddenly from an apparent heart attack on April 23, 2016 in Springfield, Massachusetts at the age of 29. ==References== ==Other websites== *New England Patriots bio *Boston College Eagles bio Category:1986 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:New England Patriots players Category:Sportspeople from Massachusetts Category:People from Springfield, Massachusetts
title: Ron Brace
